# ziti_posture_check_process (Data Source)

Ziti Posture Check Data Source, type: Process check

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "ziti_posture_check_process" "test_posture_check_process" {
  name = "test_process"
}

output "ziti_check_process" {
  value = data.ziti_posture_check_process.test_posture_check_process
}
```

- `id` (String) Identifier

- `role_attributes` (List of String) Role Attributes
